name: Reap What You Sow (Hare Software)
description:
Reap What You Sow

This game was made within 72 hours for Ludum Dare 52: Harvest.

'Reap What You Sow' is a board game in which you have to grow more plants than your opponent. Think growing your own plants is too hard? Try claiming the plants of your opponent or place weeds in their garden to mess with them. When you are running out of space, you can harvest the plants you have grown so far and try again. The player to have the most points after 30 rounds is the victor!

'Reap What You Sow' features:

  • A fully voiced Computer opponent
  • Local multiplayer
  • Pretty isometric pixel art
  • Calm and peaceful music

Controls:

Left Mouse - Select Plant /Place Plant
Right Mouse - Deselect Plant
Mouse Wheel - Rotate Plant

Credits:

Hare Software - Programming, Game Design & Graphics
Ben 'Langotriel' French - SFX, Casting & Writing
Igor Ryabykh - Music
Aiko Amami - Voice of Computer
